submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        su_h = sum(horizontalCut)
        su_v = sum(verticalCut)
        import heapq
        q1,q2 = [],[]
        for i in range(m - 1):
            heapq.heappush(q1,-horizontalCut[i])
        for i in range(n - 1):
            heapq.heappush(q2,-verticalCut[i])
        ans = 0
        while q1 or q2:
            c1 = -q1[0] if q1 else 0
            c2 = -q2[0] if q2 else 0
            if c1 > c2:
                ans += su_v
                su_h -= c1
                ans += c1
                heapq.heappop(q1)
            else:
                ans += su_h
                su_v -= c2
                ans += c2
                heapq.heappop(q2)
        return ans
